//: A rural holdout survivor living in a barn or a forest or something, all by themselves.  At some point this NPC should get special dialogue.

dynamic_line: Woah there.  That's far enough, stranger.  You look nice enough, but I won't be fooled again.  What's your business?
Hold on there.  What's your business?  Keep your hands where I can see 'em.
Don't see many survivors up these parts anymore.  'Specially not anyone in what I'd call their right mind.  Who are you, and what are you doing here?
Well now, hold it for a second.  You don't look like a zombie.  What are you doing up in these parts?

responses.text: I'm looking for other survivors to travel with me.  You game?
I'm just a traveller.  What about you?  What's your story?
No need to be scared.  I'm just looking to trade.
Fuck this.  Get the hell out of here, this is my shit now.

dynamic_line: I don't know if I'm quite comfortable discussing that with you.  How do I know you're not one of them psycho rioters?

responses.text: Oh, come on.  Has anyone like that ever tried to ask you how you came to be here?
All right then, no chit-chat.  How about we trade.
Screw it, I haven't got time for this.  Get the hell out of here before I end you.

dynamic_line: No.  I'm not about to let my guard down just so you can smash my goddamn head in.

responses.text: Fine.  You looking to trade, maybe?
Screw it, I haven't got time for this.  Get the hell out of here before I end you.
